description: This HTML file defines the user interface for a web-based Database Viewer application. It includes the layout, styles, and client-side logic (via embedded JavaScript) for browsing databases, tables, and viewing table data with interactive features.
external_files: <none direct references to external files> (embedded in HTML, no external scripts or stylesheets)
published: None - static HTML with embedded scripts

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of available databases.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list, resets current selection, and updates UI accordingly.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the list of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads and displays the tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays the data for a specific table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders table data into HTML, creating a structured view with header and rows.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates an HTML cell based on the value's type, handling objects, long strings, and nulls.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for better viewing of long strings or objects.
